name: Aspect Ratios
description:
Sometimes you just need special containers that automatically change their size according to the screen size or parent frame maintaining their proportions (or aspect ratio). With this file, I try to explain how I create those special containers and how possibly you can use them, and obviously, I hope you find it helpful.
